pull.title: refactor: move `SignSignature` helpers to test utils
pull.body: These helpers haven't been used in production code since segwit was merged more than eight years ago (see commit 605e8473, PR #8149), so it seems appropriate to move them to the test utils module. As suggested by instagibbs, see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30352#discussion_r1697515508.

Seems like a reasonable refactor.

events.message:
refactor: move `SignSignature` helpers to test utils

These helpers haven't been used in production code since segwit was
merged more than eight years ago (see commit 605e8473, PR #8149),
so it seems appropriate to move them to the test utils module.

Can be reviewed via `--color-moved=dimmed-zebra`.

events.body: Rebased on master, needed after https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30784 got merged.

ACK 58499b00d0ad1c83e433caa8fcc0e5d3fd3f2070

The helpers are already used exclusively within the test code; this is a suitable cleanup.
